name: Friday night funkin for XBOX ONE (read desc)
name_original: Friday night funkin for XBOX ONE (read desc)
description:
This project uses the source code of phykro, please credit phykro for the source code and not me, thank you. This project will work on xbox one (I dont know if it works on xbox 360) so please report bugs inmediatly, by the way check out my other projects: https://chromebook-gamerwastaken.itch.io

V0.0.2 fixed the HUGE lag spikes (switched to the sprites of the mobile version) hope you enjoy!
